77043.affected_area: Calgary (Balmoral, Brentwood, Bridgeland - Riverside, Capitol Hill, Charleswood, Collingwood, Crescent Heights, Hillhurst, Mayfair, Mountview, Mt Pleasant, National, North Haven, Renfrew, Rosemont, Sunnyside, & Tuxedo Park)
77043.summary: Some customers in the Balmoral, Brentwood, Bridgeland - Riverside, Capitol Hill, Charleswood, Collingwood, Crescent Heights, Hillhurst, Mayfair, Mountview, Mt Pleasant, National, North Haven, Renfrew, Rosemont, Sunnyside, & Tuxedo Park areas of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to vandalism caused by suspected theft of copper wire. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
